testcase.name: convertJsonToPojo

error.message: Cannot construct instance of `day6.Student` (although at least one Creator exists): no String-argument constructor/factory method to deserialize from String value ('name') at [Source: (String)" "name" : "Scott", "location" : "France", "phone" : "123456", "courses" : [ "C", "C++" ] }"; line: 2, column: 3]
